pages.text: Fey gems are very wanted by some creatures and wizards because it still contains some of the Fey's original magic.

pages.title: Fey Ore
pages.text: Be careful when mining the Fey ore. As it is fragile and putting too much pressure on the ore can lower the quality of the excavated Fey Gems.

pages.title: Fey Dust
pages.text: When a Fey passes into the next world, they leave behind a small amount of Fey Dust. Some believe the magical powder gives the power of flight to whoever it is sprinkled on.

pages.title: Fey Gems
pages.text: The fey gems can vary in quality. Higher quality gems can but cut into lower quality gems. The knowledge on how to increase the quality of a fey gem is only known by the dwarves.
